Package com.walit.streamline.audio

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.walit.streamline.audio.AudioPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class AudioPlayer extends Object implements Runnable
This is the engine for playing audio from the Song objects.
Author:
wellatleastitried

    • fillQueue

      public void fillQueue(RetrievedStorage queriedSongs)
      Fill the PriorityQueue with Song objects to playback.
      Parameters:
      queriedSongs - RetrievedStorage that contains the Song objects and their indices.

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • checkDownloadIntegrity

      public boolean checkDownloadIntegrity(Song song)
      Verifies file hash of the queued song with the hash that was generated of the file when it was created. This is done in order to ensure that files that have been tampered with cannot be used by the program.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the file hash matches the stored hash.

    • playSongFromFile

      public void playSongFromFile(String pathToAudio) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Stream the audio from the given file path.
      Parameters:
      pathToAudio - The file path of the audio file.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - The file path does not point to a file that contains audio.
      IOException
      LineUnavailableException

    • playSongFromUrl

      public void playSongFromUrl(String pathToAudio) throws Exception
      Stream the audio from the given URL.
      Parameters:
      pathToAudio - The URL that points to the audio stream.
      Throws:
      Exception
